creditline: Gift of Shared Ventures in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: woman at center, seen from behind, wearing a black fitted dress and black stiletto heels, with her blonde hair in an updo with a tiny netting cap; woman leans on an iron railing on a bridge overlooking water; man seen from back at right edge, wearing light-colored short-sleeved shirt and light-colored slacks
title: Marilyn Monroe (from behind, at river's edge), on the set of "The Misfits"
